resources.string: Drazen Petrovic was a Yugoslavian and Croatian professional basketball player
Dmitri Mendelejev was a Russian chemist and inventor
John Lennon was an English singer, songwriter and peace activist who gained worldwide fame as the founder of Beatles

string-array.name: InterestingFacts
string-array.item: Drazen petrovic died in car accident
John lennon was married with yoko ono
